alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued February 27 at 11:57PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of FL. ...THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE WINTSON-SALEM PD IS SEARCHING FOR AYDEN DUPREE SILER RIPPY. AYDEN SILER IS A 1 YR OLD BLACK MALE 2 FOOT 5 INCH TALL WEIGHS 24 LBS HE HAS BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. NO ABDUCTOR INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME OTHER THAN A DARK IN COLOR CHRYSLER 200 AND THREE BLACK MALES IN THE VEHICLE. THEY WERE LAST SEEN SOUTH ON EBERT ROAD FROM CLEMMONSVILLE RD. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFOMRATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL WINSTON-SALEM POLICE DEPARTMENT IMMEDIATELY AT 336-773-7700 OR CALL 911 OR STAR-HP. THIS IS AN AMBER ALERT. ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION...
